title: Emerald Dazzle Diamond Drops: A Modern Take on Telugu Heritage
materials: 18K Rose Gold with brilliant-cut Diamonds and faceted Emeralds. Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Geometric design with delicate diamond setting. Graduated drop design culminating in a verdant Emerald. Secure lever-back closure.
occasions: Perfect for modern occasions like cocktail parties
and festive celebrations. A subtle touch of heritage for the contemporary woman.
description: A harmonious blend of modern design and traditional gemstone pairings. The Emerald adds a touch of sophistication and traditional charm. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine and luxurious feel. These earrings are a statement piece that exudes elegance.
